title: It's Monday morning, and if you'd made some oatmeal in the slow cooker last night, it would be ready...

attachments.displayName:
It's Monday morning, and if you'd made some oatmeal in the slow cooker last night, it would be ready for a quick breakfast. Love the sound of this Slow Cooker Joyful Almond Almond Oatmeal from Our Apron Strings.

Ingredients: This recipe has steel cut oats, vanilla almond milk, water, salt, coconut oil, sliced almonds, sweetened coconut, and currants or diced raisins (optional). Donna says she's pretty sure it will be the best oatmeal you've ever eaten.

Read more about the recipe and get the link here --> http://www.slowcookerfromscratch.com/2012/02/slow-cooker-joyful-almond-oatmeal.html

Or PIN IT to save for later --> http://www.pinterest.com/pin/187603140701509468/

#SlowCooker
